Text: FREE Trial Europe and Asia energy informationDear Colleague Energy Argus has just launched two new bimonthly publications that focus on the European and Asian energy markets Argus Power Europe and Argus Asia Gas Power AND wed like to offer you a FREE noobligation trial to both Why Argus Power Europe and Argus Asia Gas Power Because you need to know whats going on in the international markets These markets are deregulating and expanding causing opportunities overseas and threatening to steal away your own domestic opportunies as well Now more than ever you need to be in the know and stay ahead of your competition and to take advantage of these new business opportunities Argus Power Europe covers these essential issues Consolidation whos buying what and why New developments whos building what and when and what equipment they need Price trends and analysis Analysis of the differences in the European markets from the Nordic markets complex structure and the dominant UK and German markets to the EU expansions impact on new markets in the Czech Republic Hungary and Poland Much much more Argus Asia Gas Power covers the electricity and natural gas markets in Asia from upstream to downstream Its power coverage focuses on restructuring financing competition and demand both residential and commercial Its gas coverage focuses on supply to and from the Asia region including proposals to ship for the first time liquefied natural gas from Asia and Australia to the US West Coast a development that may have a serious impact on the USs involvement in the regions gas industry Our news coverage also details new developments whos building what and when and what equipment they need SIGN UP TODAY To start your FREE noobligation trial to one or both newsletters just reply to this email and let us know which ones youd like to receive mailto If you would rather not receive Argus promotions please follow instructions at the bottom of this message Energy Argus K Street NW Suite Washington DC Tel Fax mailto If you would prefer not to receive further messages from this sender Click on the Reply button Replace the Subject field with the word REMOVE Click the Send button You will receive one additional email message confirming your removal
